translations: v．提供，提出（建议、意见等）：主动提供或提出某物，尤指为了帮助或提供信息。
· He proffers his help to the new student.

sentences.sentence: Yves de San, from Beirut, proffers an historical analogy
sentences.translation: 来自贝鲁特的伊夫·德森（Yves de San）提供了一个历史性的分析

sentences.sentence: Indeed, almost every facet of software development proffers at least one framework.
sentences.translation: 确实，几乎软件开发的每个方面都提供了至少一个框架。

sentences.sentence: These are wholly of their own time, and work only with the forms and the ideas that their time proffers them.
sentences.translation: 这些就是他们时代的全部（这句不太顺，不知道前文是什么），并且只在时代供给的形式和思想下创作。
